Tailwind Introduction

The major points of HTML are given below:

Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that provides low-level utility classes for styling web applications directly in HTML. Unlike traditional CSS frameworks like Bootstrap, which provide pre-designed components, Tailwind allows you to build custom designs by composing classes.
